projects.title: Deepfake Detection System
projects.subtitle: Advanced AI system for detecting manipulated media using hybrid deep learning
projects.description: Developed a sophisticated Deepfake Detection system using a hybrid CNN + Multi-Head Self-Attention architecture that significantly improves detection accuracy and robustness across diverse datasets. The system combines convolutional neural networks for feature extraction with multi-head self-attention mechanisms for enhanced pattern recognition, achieving superior performance in identifying manipulated videos and images.

seo.metaDescription: Advanced deepfake detection system using hybrid CNN and Multi-Head Self-Attention architecture for robust media authenticity verification.

featuredImages.alt: CNN and attention mechanism hybrid model

carouselMetadata.value1: AI/ML Engineer
Hybrid CNN + Multi-Head Self-Attention model combining spatial feature extraction with attention-based pattern recognition
Achieved improved detection accuracy across multiple benchmark datasets with enhanced robustness to diverse manipulation techniques
Applied model quantization and optimization techniques for efficient inference and practical deployment scenarios

highlights: Designed and implemented hybrid CNN-MHSA architecture using PyTorch
Trained and validated on multiple datasets including FaceForensics++, Celeb-DF, and DFDC
Achieved superior accuracy through enhanced feature extraction and attention mechanisms
Applied 4-bit and 8-bit quantization for optimized inference performance
Conducted extensive ablation studies to validate architectural decisions
Demonstrated robustness against various deepfake generation techniques

projects.title: Headless CMS Architecture
projects.subtitle: Modern decoupled architecture enabling flexible, scalable content delivery
projects.description: Architected and implemented a Headless/Decoupled Drupal platform with React front-end, delivering superior performance, flexibility, and user experience across multiple client projects. The solution separates content management from presentation, enabling API-driven architecture that supports multi-channel content delivery, improved developer workflow, and enhanced scalability.

seo.metaDescription: Modern headless CMS architecture using Drupal and React for flexible, scalable content delivery across multiple platforms.

carouselMetadata.value1: Full-Stack Developer
Decoupled Drupal backend with React front-end, connected via RESTful APIs and JSON data flows
Achieved 60% improvement in page load times and enhanced scalability through optimized caching strategies
Multi-channel content delivery supporting web, mobile, and third-party platform integration

highlights: Designed API-first architecture enabling flexible front-end delivery
Implemented custom Drupal modules for REST API endpoints and content models
Built responsive React front-end with optimized component architecture
Integrated JWT authentication and secure API communication
Reduced page load times by 60% through strategic caching and optimization
Enabled multi-channel content delivery across platforms

projects.title: University Management Platform
projects.subtitle: Comprehensive educational institution platform managing thousands of student profiles
projects.description: Developed a large-scale university management system handling complex student profiles, course management, enrollment workflows, and administrative operations for thousands of users. The platform provides robust role-based access control, automated workflows, and scalable architecture to support the diverse operational needs of a modern educational institution.

seo.metaDescription: Enterprise-scale university management system handling complex student operations, course management, and administrative workflows.

carouselMetadata.value1: Software Developer
Student profiles, course management, enrollment workflows, grade tracking, and administrative dashboards
Custom Drupal modules with optimized database design for handling complex relationships and large datasets
Role-based access control, secure authentication, and data protection compliance

highlights: Managed complex data relationships for thousands of student profiles
Developed custom enrollment and course management workflows
Implemented role-based permissions system for administrators, faculty, and students
Optimized database queries for improved performance with large datasets
Integrated third-party authentication and notification systems
Built reporting and analytics dashboards for administrative insights

projects.title: Property Investment Platform
projects.subtitle: Innovative platform connecting investors with real estate opportunities
projects.description: Built a comprehensive property investment platform enabling users to browse, analyze, and invest in real estate opportunities. The system features sophisticated search and filtering, detailed property analytics, secure transaction processing, and investor portfolio management, providing a seamless experience from property discovery to investment completion.

seo.metaDescription: Modern property investment platform with secure transactions, portfolio management, and real-time property analytics.

carouselMetadata.value1: Software Developer
Property listings, investment analytics, secure transactions, portfolio management, and investor dashboards
PCI-compliant payment processing, encrypted data storage, and secure authentication mechanisms
REST API integrations with payment gateways, property data providers, and financial systems

highlights: Developed secure investment transaction processing system
Implemented advanced property search with filters and analytics
Built investor portfolio management and tracking dashboards
Integrated payment gateway APIs for secure financial transactions
Created automated notification system for investment opportunities
Optimized performance for handling large property datasets

projects.title: Laboratory Management System
projects.subtitle: Streamlined workflow automation for medical laboratory operations
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive laboratory management system that automates sample collection, tracking, and result delivery workflows. The platform integrates with third-party ticketing systems for blood sample collection and submission, providing real-time tracking, automated notifications, and secure result delivery to patients and healthcare providers.

seo.metaDescription: Automated laboratory management system with third-party integration for efficient sample tracking and result delivery.

carouselMetadata.value1: Software Developer
Automated sample collection ticketing, tracking, processing, and result delivery workflows
RESTful API integration with third-party laboratory information systems and ticketing platforms
Healthcare data security standards and patient privacy regulations

highlights: Integrated REST APIs with third-party ticketing systems
Automated sample collection and submission workflows
Built real-time tracking system for sample lifecycle management
Implemented secure patient result delivery portal
Developed automated notification system for sample status updates
Ensured compliance with healthcare data security standards

projects.title: Multisite Deployment Automation
projects.subtitle: Intelligent automation reducing deployment time by 75%
projects.description: Created a sophisticated automation script for multisite Drupal deployment, dramatically reducing deployment time and human error while ensuring consistency across environments. The solution automates configuration management, database synchronization, and deployment workflows, enabling rapid and reliable multi-instance deployments.

seo.metaDescription: Automated multisite deployment solution reducing deployment time by 75% with zero-error consistency.

carouselMetadata.value1: Software Developer
Automated configuration management, database synchronization, and multi-environment deployments
Eliminated manual errors and ensured consistent deployments across all environments
Supports deployment of multiple Drupal instances simultaneously with parallel processing

highlights: Reduced deployment time from 4 hours to 1 hour per site
Eliminated manual configuration errors through automation
Implemented parallel processing for simultaneous deployments
Created comprehensive logging and error handling mechanisms
Built rollback functionality for failed deployments
Integrated with Git for version control and deployment tracking
